entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • u8 literals should support literal concatenation #60896
  • Inheritance margin crashing when multiple symbols are on the same line. #60894
  • Disable live code analysis #60892
  • For loop auto completion, why not make settings to customize it's behavior? #60891
  • Show entire string in constant string interpolation tooltip #60890
  • Add a command to expand the C# property { get; set; } #60889
  • Inconsistency around accessibility checks for interface implementations #60885
  • SyntaxTree generated XML document comments attribute params source text incorrect #60884
  • Stack Trace Explorer Should Open Reference Assemblies #60883
  • Suggest type parameter constraints, including "generic math" interfaces #60878
  • Incorrect intellisense message for non constant case in a switch #60876
    Backlog
  • IDE0058 is not executed if the method contains #if #60875
  • Update refereneces to release version for 17.2 rtw #60873
    17.2

Closed

  • Yet another spurious warning from NRTs #60880
  • New Inline Rename text is hard to read in blue theme #60734
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Verify conversion kinds in native int conversion tests #60895
    Area-Compilers
  • Add feature to show users what global-usings are in scope at the top of a file. #60893
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Respect test requests to expedite processing in solution crawler. #60886
    Area-IDE
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Update source-generators.cookbook.md #60881
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update simplify-type-names to understand global imports. #60872
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • [semi-auto-props]: Remove an already-fixed prototype #60809
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix infinite loop introduced with https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/60227 #60852
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix shift binding for preview on new rename UI #60887
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60877
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unused method `Binder.CheckViability<TSymbol>()` #60865
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix typo in Stack Trace Explorer text #60853
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove deprecated NuPkg projects #60839
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Cleanup global notification code more. #60866
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Cleanup brace completion code. #60854
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix the color key for rename hint text at the bottom #60847
    Area-IDE, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60897
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Formatting options fallback and Document extensions #60803
    Area-IDE
  • Handle unexpected keyword rather than identifier for lambda parameter name #60825
    Area-Compilers
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Handle cases where 'field' keyword shouldn't generate a field #60806
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix generate event handler with invalid name (#59935) #60810
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Set a non-fatal error handler that rethrows exceptions in tests #36565
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
